channel.title: Comments on: Cinnamon Rolls – Daring Bakers Challenge June 2014

item.title: By: Shelley C
item.dc:creator: Shelley C
item.description: Your buns (scrolls) look scrumptious! I am glad you tried a new recipe - if for no other reason than to confirm your love for your trusted one :) Thank you so much for baking with me this month!
